title: Punchcut Seeks Mid-level Interface Designer
content:
Punchcut is seeking a mid-level interface designer for a full-   
time, contract to hire position (temp to perm). You will design   
and produce interface elements, web sites and Flash media   
assets under the direction of a creative director and in   
collaboration with Flash developers as needed.   
   
**The ideal candidate:**   
- Has a BFA or equivalent in graphic design   
- Is seasoned with 3 to 5 years of real-world interface design experience   
- Is passionate about design and wants to grow with us   
- Approaches interface design conceptually and systematically   
- Is highly organized and detail oriented   
- Is proficient in Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign (in that order)   
- Has a basic knowledge of Flash (knows how to prepare art for Flash)   
- Loves pixels and understands the pros and cons of various web image formats   
- Can prepare and organize perfect files in his/her sleep   
- Has agency experience (though this is not a requirement)   
   
Interested candidates should send a cover letter, resume, and   
online work samples to work-at-punchcut.com. Please do not   
reply to this post with your links/resumes/contact info. (No   
employment related phone calls please.)   
   
For information about Punchcut, please refer to   
 [http://www.punchcut.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804205531/http:/www.punchcut.com/)
author: Joe Pemberton
